settings.title: Next Day Shipping
settings.content: Order your Handsling CEXevo frame today, and we'll have it shipped out quickly—typically within 1-2 business days.

settings.liquid: Trustpilot

settings.title: Submit your Measurements
settings.content:
Don't settle for a one-size-fits-all bike. Handsling offers a tailored bike fitting service to our customers, ensuring we find the right fit of frame, spacers, stem and bars.

Submit your measurements and learn more here

settings.title: Discuss your new frame on webchat or contact us if you have any question:
settings.content: Tel. 01420 612700 or email sales@handslingbikes.com

custom_css: .product-gallery {/* Styles that apply to all sizes */}

settings.liquid: Trustpilot

settings.author: David Hunter
settings.content: I seem to have a long list of things that the Handsling team are helping out with - advice / adjustments / fitting / etc... literally nothing seems too much to ask. So in short - the whole team has been fantastic - at no point has this felt like a 'transaction' - I feel like I've got a 'family' who are as passionate about the sport as I am!

settings.author: John Mullineaux
settings.content: When I ride it on asphalt, I feel like I am on my road bike and when on gravel it feels as stable as a MTB. Cool!

settings.author: Ian Loades
settings.content: Very positive experience highly recommend their service and bikes. Took time on my questions and excessive pondering.

settings.author: AC
settings.content: Stiff, nimble and really quick, yet more than comfortable…..that frame is seriously top! All the set up was spot on; using 28’s tyres perfect for the gnarly Yorkshire tarmac,

settings.author: Ben Reidy
settings.content: I was free wheeling when others where pedalling lol it just cut through the air! Roll on next event!

settings.author: Chris Hughes
settings.content: The bike - A1RO Evo Ultegra Di2 is a dream! It's fast without being twitchy, comfortable on long rides and climbs brilliantly too. Puts a smile on my face every time I ride it!

Customer Reviews

Check out more reviews of the Handsling CEXevo on Trustpilot or Facebook.

settings.liquid: Trustpilot

settings.title: Sizing Guide
settings.content: Finding the right size bike can be a bit overwhelming, but don't worry - we're here to help. The right size bike will ensure a comfortable and safe ride, so it's important to take some time to find the perfect fit.

settings.title: Dimensions
settings.content: Carbon frames are manufactured in the Far East using moulds that are owned by Handsling. This provides full control over the production process and makes each and every model exclusive to the brand.

settings.title: Feature name
settings.content: Share useful information about your product features.

settings.title: Feature name
settings.content: Share useful information about your product features.

settings.title: Feature name
settings.content: Share useful information about your product features.

settings.title: Frame Production
settings.content:
Handsling owns the moulds used to make the CEXevo, allowing more control over the production process. Internal EPS moulds are used for increased carbon compaction, making the frame lighter, stiffer and more robust.

The CEXevo is made from high performance yet durable Toray T800 series carbon. The frame stiffness means it climbs well, while its light weight makes it easy to carry over obstacles or run with when the going gets really tough. 

Frame weight: 870g for a 52cm frame. Front fork weight is 370g.

settings.title: Clearance
settings.content: The CEXevo has excellent tyre clearance both front and rear, and with 33mm cyclocross tyres fitted there is plenty of clearance to cope with even the muddiest of days. Maximum tyre size is 40mm, meaning plenty of room to fit gravel tyres.

settings.title: Handling
settings.content: Relaxed geometry and a long wheel base offers stability to carry the rider quickly and with more confidence down descents, and yet the CEXevo still climbs with speed and efficiency.

settings.title: Comfort
settings.content: Flexibility is built into the frame thanks to long, narrow seat stays, which result in improved comfort levels that leave the rider fresher over long rides and for that sprint to the finish line. This flexibility also aids rear wheel traction on loose ground.

settings.title: Tailor-fitted
settings.content:
Bikes are assembled in Handsling's UK workshop according to rider size and spec, including high-end components from Shimano, SRAM, and Campagnolo, and your choice of wheels and finishing kit.

We offer Remote Tailored Sizing so you can get the best fit.

Learn more

settings.title: Tough, Light and Durable.
settings.content:
The versatile, UCI approved Handsling CEXevo is tough, light and durable, ideal to cope with the rigours of cyclocross racing and gravel adventures. Designed in-house, the CEXevo frame is an evolution of the championship winning CEX. Improvements include higher grade carbon and changes to the layup used in both headtube and bottom bracket shell, resulting in a laterally stiffer frame while maintaining comfort levels.

The UCI-approved road frame is available in 17 limited edition colours.

settings.title: ALL COMPONENTS
settings.content:
• A1R0evo frame and fork - Check our In-stock FRAMES section for available colours and sizes
  • Handsling integrated Race carbon bars (please confirm bar width and stem length in notes when ordering)
  • Handsling aero D-shaped seatpost
  • Handsling Superlight Thru Axles
  • 1.5" Integrated Headset
  • Handsling Tubeless Ready or Hookless Tubeless handbuilt wheels (please confirm required wheel style and depth in notes when ordering)**
  • Shimano Dura-ace 9270 Di2 12-speed power meter groupset (please confirm crank length, and chainset and cassette gear ratios in notes)*
  • Shimano Dura-ace rotors 160mm front and 140mm rear*
  • Prologoo or Supacaz bar tape to match bike*
  • Handsling Carbon Rib Cage bottle cages
  • Prologo Dimension Saddle with Carbon Rails*
  • HSCER Ceramic BB86 bottom bracket
  • Schwalbe or Continental or Vittoria tubeless tyres (confirm width in notes when ordering)*
  • Tubeless rim tape, valve and sealant

*Note that this build is fully customisable with all items marked with an asterisk - contact us for details.

**Wheels can be from any of the following brands; contact us for a quote:

Campagnolo
Shimano
DT Swiss
Deda
FFWD
Vision
ENVE
Zipp
Classified

settings.title: Example Build
settings.content: This build is fully customisable, with all items marked with an asterisk within components section.

settings.title: BUILT JUST FOR YOU
settings.content: Every rider deserves a bike tailored to their unique riding style and performance goals. We offer personalised performance service for our high-performance carbon bikes.

settings.title: UCI-Approved Frame
settings.content: Use this text to share information about your brand with your customers. Describe a product, share announcements, or welcome customers to your store.

settings.title: CARBON T800 TORAY
settings.content: High tensile and high modulus carbon fiber with patented Nanoalloy Technology for extreme performances.

settings.title: Bike Buying Consultation
settings.content: From sizing and frame colour, to wheels and components, your Handsling bike is custom fit to your personal requirements.

settings.title: Tailored Bike Fitting
settings.content: A properly fitting bike is essential for achieving peak performance and comfort on the road, track or trail. That's why we offer tailored bike fitting for our high-performance carbon bikes.

settings.title: Do you ship overseas?
settings.content: Yes, we ship all over the world. Shipping costs will apply, and will be automatically added at checkout. Find out more here

settings.title: How long will it take to get my orders?
settings.content:
All our bikes are personalised to you, and we want to ensure the bike is fit to your exact measurements and requirements. Custom bike builds can take 2-3 weeks dependant on stock and delivery address.

Check out Handsling's latest in stock Bikes, available for custom assembly on a two-week turnaround. 

All other products are shipped within 24 hours of purchase.

settings.title: Do you offer Cycle to Work schemes?
settings.content:
Yes we do. Handsling bikes are available via Green Commute Initiative, Cyclescheme, Cycle Solutions and My Benefit World.

More information can be found here

settings.title: Need a hand? Handsling are here to help.
settings.content:
For advice on products and services or general enquiries, please contact us, and we will be more than happy to help. We've provided our contact information here.

To help you locate the support you need fast, We have listed our most frequently asked questions at our Help Centre.
We have a range of test bikes available. Book a test ride today at our UK workshop, or schedule a video call with our sales team.
